Basically Commie using koestl's well TL of the VN for their own ego and benefit. Without koestl they're nothing. A copy paste of the VN unto the anime just shows how far sunk low these band of kids has gotten of what's called "fan-subbing."

Copies the dialogue from the VN and makes it longer than what is actually being said. Lots of lines go over the normal CPS (Characters per second). Herkz editing at its finest. Commie group. Same people, same smell.
Commie copy pasting the VN translation.
Took the subs from a fan TL, including all the scriptwriting. Line timing is abysmal, as VNs don't have the time constraint that subtitles have. Black bars not cropped.
TL'd by one of the main editors oft he VN, of course you should watch the anime with these subs as well~
best by far, consistent dialogue style (especially makina), no surprise since the editor already have experience with the VN and also knows Koestl
